data.message: Here is a second case of history repeating Its self they gave him a polygraph and he passed it he continues to abuse and sexually abuse his children for almost a decade after cps has the indication he shouldn't be around children. The whole thing could have been prevented but instead I was abused and I later wound up with an abuser. Because my own parents are abusive I don't have the help I need. That is history repeating itsself.
